product_name: Overland Equipment Donner Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: Find what you need with ease in the women's well-organized Overland Equipment Donner Shoulder Bag. Its 2 side sleeves can hold a water bottle, compact umbrella--and even a wine bottle!
